nodes.text: Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 4

Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 4 is the fourth issue of the Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 published by De Agostini. It came with the processor state indicator for the build-able R2-D2 and contained the articles "Filming R2-D2, Part 1", "3PO-series protocol droids, Part 2" and "CMOS: image sensors".
